Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)
        
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        wash_shirt(shirt)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Dry the shirt.', '3. Iron the shirt.']

def is_clothes_shirt_wet(shirt:item):
    symbol wet=exists w: item : is_clothes_shirt(w) and has_water(w) and dirty(w)
    return wet

behavior clean_shirt_in_sink(shirt: item, sink: item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            wash(shirt)
            rinse(shirt)
            squeeze(shirt)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
        else:
            wash(shirt)
            rinse(shirt)
            squeeze(shirt)        

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        if not is_clothes_shirt_wet(shirt):
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink)
            clean_shirt_in_sink(shirt, sink)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the washed shirt.']

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)
        # Ensure the shirt is washed and clean

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a shirt that is identified as clothing and is dirty
        
        wash_shirt(shirt)

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Wash the shirt.', '2. Iron the shirt.']

behavior wipe_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink

behavior rinse_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Rinse the shirt inside the sink

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select shirt to be washed
        
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink)
        # Select any available sink for washing
        
        wipe_shirt(shirt, sink)
        rinse_shirt(shirt, sink)
        clean_shirt(shirt)
